attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDVfoJ6K9SC184JC3Us_freetext
attribs.current:
Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons, which are shortswords and any simple melee weapons that don't have the two-handed or heavy property.
You gain the following benefits while you are unarmed or wielding only monk weapons and you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield:
You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
You can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike or monk weapon. This die changes as you gain monk levels, as shown in the Martial Arts column of the Monk table.
When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon on your turn, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action. For example, if you take the Attack action and attack with a quarterstaff, you can also make an unarmed strike as a bonus action, assuming you haven't already taken a bonus action this turn.
Certain monasteries use specialized forms of the monk weapons. For example, you might use a club that is two lengths of wood connected by a short chain (called a nunchaku) or a sickle with a shorter, straighter blade (called a kama). Whatever name you use for a monk weapon, you can use the game statistics provided for the weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDVfoJ6K9SC184JC3Us_display_text
attribs.current:
Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons, which are shortswords and any simple melee weapons that don't have the two-handed or heavy property.
You gain the following benefits while you are unarmed or wielding only monk weapons and you aren't wearing armor or wielding a shield:
You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and monk weapons.
You can roll a d4 in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike or monk weapon. This die changes as you gain monk levels, as shown in the Martial Arts column of the Monk table.
When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon on your turn, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action. For example, if you take the Attack action and attack with a quarterstaff, you can also make an unarmed strike as a bonus action, assuming you haven't already taken a bonus action this turn.
Certain monasteries use specialized forms of the monk weapons. For example, you might use a club that is two lengths of wood connected by a short chain (called a nunchaku) or a sickle with a shorter, straighter blade (called a kama). Whatever name you use for a monk weapon, you can use the game statistics provided for the weapon.

attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current: simple weapons, Shortsword, fiddle, navigation tools, water vehicles

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDZv-DfLILV6jhglxGb_display_text
attribs.current:
You can try to hide when you are lightly obscured from the creature from which you are hiding.
 When you are hidden from a creature and miss it with a ranged weapon attack, making the attack doesn't reveal your position.
 Dim light doesnt impose disadvantage on your Wisdom (Perception) checks relying on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KDZrrEcYmw7UT6CEkyF_freetext
attribs.current:
Your training allows you to harness the mystic energy of ki. Your access to this energy is represented by a number of ki points.
You can spend these points to fuel various ki features. You start knowing three such features: Flurry of Blows, Patient Defense, and Step of the Wind. You learn more ki features as you gain levels in this class.
When you spend a ki point, it is unavailable until you finish a short or long rest, at the end of which you draw all of your expended ki back into yourself. You must spend at least 30 minutes of the rest meditating to regain your ki points.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KDZrrEelWbuetHIPGoB_freetext
attribs.current: Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KDZrrEfzWDdd1JXwsKN_freetext
attribs.current: You can spend 1 kipoint to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KDZrrEi85lHh984yX4-_freetext
attribs.current: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDZrrEkt14jsivfVNa5_freetext
attribs.current:
Your speed increases by 10 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus increases when you reach certain monk levels, as shown in the Monk table.
At 9th level, you gain the ability to move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDZrrEkt14jsivfVNa5_display_text
attribs.current:
Your speed increases by 10 feet while you are not wearing armor or wielding a shield. This bonus increases when you reach certain monk levels, as shown in the Monk table.
At 9th level, you gain the ability to move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDsvNuk3smtSQJNehqz_freetext
attribs.current: Beginning at 1st level, while you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KDsvNuk3smtSQJNehqz_display_text
attribs.current: Beginning at 1st level, while you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFHyjESwc96WdJrVMyL_freetext
attribs.current: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KFHyjESwc96WdJrVMyL_display_text
attribs.current: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KGxm4y2Xmd3ExeisGpj_freetext
attribs.current:
You can use your reaction to deflect or catch the missile when you are hit by a ranged weapon attack. When you do so, the damage you take from the attack is reduced by [[d10 + @{dexterity_mod}[dex] + @{monk_level}[monk level]]].
If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. Ifyou catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack with the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, as part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiencies, and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack, which has a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KGxm4y2Xmd3ExeisGpj_display_text
attribs.current:

If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. Ifyou catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack with the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, as part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiencies, and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack, which has a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHbpXYmE55N95g7rgF-_content
attribs.current:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose with in range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision cant see through this darkness, and nonmagical light cant illuminate it.

If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isnt being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bow l or a helm , blocks the darkness.

If any of this spells area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHmkKjXMAfZNTLEt7kN_content
attribs.current: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark. For the duration, that creature has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHmkhfnHVv1de-O7TUb_content
attribs.current: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and cant be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHml5f76U7CZE3XCkRc_content
attribs.current: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centred on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHmluBG29EP563iOJh5_target
attribs.current: One Weapon or piece of ammunition

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHmluBG29EP563iOJh5_content
attribs.current:
You may coat one blade or piece of ammunition with a thick, viscous venom. The venom lasts for the duration of the spell or until it strikes, becoming inert after it ends. On a hit, the target must succeed a Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 poison damage. On a successful save the target takes no additional poison damage. 

At higher levels the damage dice increases to 2d6 (level 5) 3d6 (level 11) and 4d6 (level 17)
If you cast this spell again, the spell ends early on any weapon or ammunition still affected by it.

attribs.name: repeating_spell_-KHmluBG29EP563iOJh5_materials
attribs.current: A piece from a venomous Spider

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJIZUd3vaMyB5Lw-2-Y_display_text
attribs.current:
Your speed increases by 10 feet.

W hen you use the Dash action, difficult terrain doesnt cost you extra movement on that turn.

 When you make a melee attack against a creature, you dont provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether you hit or not.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJIZ3jODP3OntKksBGP_freetext
attribs.current: You can use your reaction when you fall to reduce any falling damage you take by [[5 * @{monk_level}]].
